aboutInfoText1.message: Price.99 gives your control over how prices are displayed on the page using a set of rounding rules.

aboutInfoText2.message: Don’t like psychological pricing? Round all prices ending in .99 to the nearest dollar.

aboutInfoText3.message: Want to reduce clutter and see nice, round prices? Round up everything to the nearest $$10.

aboutInfoText4.message: Shopping for a new gadget and need a quick-and-dirty way to compare prices? Round them up to the nearest hundred, or even to the nearest thousand.

aboutInfoText5.message: Price.99 DOES NOT change the actual price. You will not pay more.

aboutFeatures2.message: Customizable price rounding from the nearest dollar to the nearest thousand

aboutFeaturesDev1.message: Price detection in dynamically loaded content

rulesInfoText.message: Price.99 rounds prices according to rules. Select a rule and adjust the cut-off value for rounding. Hover over rules for more information.

whitelistInfoText1.message: You can specify a list of sites where Price.99 will not round any prices.

whitelistInfoText2.message: Enter the URL of the site, and click "Add":

whitelistInfoText3.message: Do not round prices on these sites:

hideZerpOptInfo.message: This will hide cents for whole prices.

hundRuleInfo.message: Prices ending in or more hundreds will be rounded up to the nearest thousand.

tenRuleInfo.message: Prices ending in or more tens will be rounded up to the nearest hundred.

dolRuleInfo.message: Prices ending in or more dollars will be rounded up to the nearest ten.

centRuleInfo.message: Prices ending in or more cents will be rounded up to the nearest dollar.
